results.name: Characteristic function for A273670: 1 if there is at least one maximal digit present in the factorial representation of n (A007623), otherwise 0.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..5040
Index entries for sequences related to factorial base representation
formula: If A260736(n) = 0 then a(n) = 0, otherwise a(n) = 1.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 22 2016
